attributes.action: Set a professional minimum wage for the professional driving industry.
attributes.additional_details: With the shortage of people within the driving industry the needs to be seen being as proactive as possible and bring in new blood into the driving industry setting a professional minimum wage for these jobs would be seen as being proactive and attract new drivers into driving jobs within Britian.
attributes.background: We are classed as professional drivers and we are urging the government to set a professional minimum wage that employers cannot go below.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for a similar action: 

Create a minimum wage for bus and coach drivers of £15 per hour:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598377

Increase the minimum wage for HGV drivers:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584881

If you'd like something else, you could start a new petition clearly setting out what you would like to happen.
